strapiPost.title: Efforts To Activate Culture In Bentonville Arts & Market District
strapiPost.content:
The art culture in Northwest Arkansas is enhanced all the time with creative initiatives and events. This spring Creative Arkansas Community Hub & Exchange (CACHE) is partnering with regional artists and organizations to activate a vision for the Arts & Market District of Bentonville. 

  • To scale: In an effort to foster a strong neighborhood identity revolving around creativity, entrepreneurship, and community, there will be a large-scale public artwork by CACHE Studios to elevate the neighborhood’s identity. 
  • Makers and music: Two free events are happening at CACHE Studios this spring including a makers market we wrote about recently and a musical affair titled “It’s In The Air.” The latter will, with 2 sets, tell a musical history of Arkansas. 

For more information, click HERE.
